episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4001_1001: Here you go! An Arven-original sandwich!
Don’t eat it too fast, OK?
(It seems to trust its Trainer a great deal.)
(And the Trainer clearly loves it in return...)

(They are full of trust and affection for
each other.)
I’d like to hear more of your Pokémon’s voice!
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/6801_1031:
Now it’s my turn to show
off what I can do. You’re
getting a taste of my food!
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/6801_1001:
There’s so many things I wanna do, but first,
let’s eat!

Gotta check out what kinda ingredients I can get
on Pasio...
Oh, are you excited to eat too, Mabosstiff?
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4002_1001: Who are you supposed to be?
My name is N. I’m a Trainer from Unova.

You two have the ideal relationship—I just had to
come talk to you!
And I’d like to listen to your Pokémon’s voice.

Not quite. I can hear what Pokémon are actually
saying.
What they’re thinking, how they’re feeling...

I mean, sure, Trainers can usually tell what their
Pokémon is feeling, more or less...

But literally hearing what they’re saying is going a
bit too far...

I, uh...I actually have plans with my friends! Yeah!
I’d better hurry! See you later!
(So that Pokémon is called Mabosstiff, huh...)

(Their relationship is exactly the ideal that I’ve
been looking for.)
(I want to learn more about them!)
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4003_1001: Wow! What a wild story!

I’ve only just arrived on Pasio, and I’m
already tired...

But if what that guy said was true, wouldn’t that
be amazing!

If I could hear my Veevees’ voices, I’d be so
happy I wouldn’t know what to do with myself...

But that’s totally unscientific, y’know? He could
just be saying stuff like that for the attention.
Yeah, that’s what I thought.

Hmmm... I don’t think we should assume the worst
right away.

Maybe he just wanted to be friends with you
and Mabosstiff!

Haha! That kind of thinking is why you’re the
student council president.

Seems like a shame to just turn him away,
especially when he went out of his way to talk
to you. You could make a new friend...

Sure, he seems a little weird, but you could say
that about us, too.
Huh. That’s an unusually positive opinion, Penny.
Oi.
But Penny’s right!

Why don’t you look at it as a part of your
independent study and try to expand your social
circle? I bet it’ll be fun!
I guess...

but when I meet new people, I don’t make the
best first impression.
I should probably work on that...
Oh, you hungry?
Here! Your favorite sandwich!
Mabosstiff really likes your cooking, Arven!
Well, it doesn’t taste half bad.
Hehe! It’s nutritious, too!
I use ingredients that’ll perk you right up!
Healthy cooking? I see...

So that’s the secret behind your friendship
with Mabosstiff.
Whoa! Where’d you come from?!
Could you teach me how to make that dish, Arven?

Hold on a second! I never told you my name!
How do you know it?!
Your friend said it earlier, no?
Creeeeepy...

Please, Arven. I want to learn about your
cooking—and about the two of you as well.

A world full of love between people and
Pokémon...

I think you could help me find the key to
creating that!
Love?! World?! What’re you talking about?!
L-let’s go, Mabosstiff!
Wait, Arven!
Ahh! Stop following me!
I think I see what Arven meant now...
That guy’s a real character, isn’t he?
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4004_1001:
*pant pant*
What’s up with that guy?
I just want to talk, Arven.
I see. We’re playing a game of tag first.
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4005_1001: Can we talk about your cooking now, Arven?
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4006_1001: I-I give up... I’m tired of running...

I agree. We’ve done enough of this. Mabosstiff
seems satisfied as well.
Look...
I can see that you’re probably not a bad person.

But first things first—could you explain what you
meant by that stuff about a world full of love?

Ah, that. Sorry, I was excited and got ahead
of myself.

I want to create a world where we don’t need
Poké Balls.
Don't need Poké Balls? What does that mean?

If people and Pokémon can truly understand
each other...

then we should be able to trust and help each
other without Poké Balls binding us together.
That’s...quite a big dream you have there.

Your relationship with Mabosstiff is so close to the
ideal that I envision. That’s why I wanted to learn
even more about you two.

I think you two would still be friends, even without
using a Poké Ball.
I see. I get what you mean.
OK, sure. I’ll tell you a bit about us.

When I was younger, I spent a lot of time at home
by myself.

I didn’t get much parental attention. Apparently
work was more important.
But Mabosstiff has always been by my side.

He’s basically family... That’s how important he is
to me.
Is that the kind of love you’re talking about?
Family, huh...
That’s why you two are so close.

I grew up with Pokémon from childhood, so...I
understand how you feel.
You too...?
Yes.
No way. I didn’t know we were so similar.
Guess so.
Oh, you hungry? Well then...
Wait, Arven.
Hm?
He says he wants something sweet this time.

Give him a sandwich that has some
sweet ingredients.
Huh?
(How does he know that?)

(Someone who likes Pokémon could tell if one is
hungry or something...)
(But that was...)

You’ve only just met Mabosstiff, so how can you
tell so clearly how he’s feeling?
I told you.
I can hear the voices of Pokémon.
You were serious...
Hahaha... You’re an interesting guy!

Now, let me ask you again... Could I listen to
Mabosstiff’s voice?
Sure! Listen as much as you like!
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4007_1001:
Today I’m personally gonna teach you how
to cook!
Thanks so much!
All right! Let’s go!
Yeeeaaarrrghhh! Hiya! Hwatcha! Hyah!

And that’s how it goes. Do you think you can
do that?
Sure, I’ll give it a shot.

Have you ever used a knife before?! What kind of
cut is that?!
The heat’s too high! Look, it’s burning!
It’s not easy, is it...
D-don’t worry... Everyone starts off like that!

We still have enough ingredients! There’s no need
to give up—let’s try again!
OK!
I...I made this dish!
We did it somehow... I’m exhausted...

Your partner’s been waiting. Hurry up and give
him a taste already!
Oh, right!

Sorry to keep you waiting, Zoroark.
Could you try this?
Really? Great!
He looks happy!

It’s nice to do your own cooking sometimes,
isn’t it?
Yeah! It’s truly wonderful!

Not just sharing great-tasting food, but the
process of making it as well...

I learned that if you’re thinking about who you’re
cooking for while you’re cooking, your bond will
become even stronger.
O-OK... You’re talking really fast...

On top of that, you can select any combination
of ingredients, spices, and cooking methods to
produce an infinite array of outcomes!
The formula of cooking is very fascinating!
Formula, huh... They do say cooking is a science.

Well, if you decide to keep pursuing cooking, I can
teach you whenever you want.
Are you sure?
Of course!
You and I are buds now! No need to hold back!
Buds?
It means “friends”!
Friends...

It’s hard to explain, but...I always just took for
granted that Mabosstiff liked me...

but you gave me proof that he does, and that
made me really happy.
That’s why...
if you consider me and Mabosstiff your friends...
then we’re already buds!
Thank you, Arven! Mabosstiff!
Don’t mention it!
episode_event_ch0317_00_pepper/4008_1001:
I’m learning from a sync pair I recently
befriended.
That’s great! I’d like to try your cooking sometime!
Oh, is this your new friend?
